name: v25.11.0-trunk.60
body:
Armbian rolling releases


- rolling releases are available at the bottom of official download pages - How to change type of images that are provided by Armbian? - How to switch between stable and rolling release? Please note that Armbian Rolling Releases are not recommended for production environments, as these builds are not thoroughly tested. However, in most cases, they should work well.

Weekly Digest

  • Add gpg as armbian-config package dependency. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/configng#658
  • Add HAOS to Debian Trixe. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/os#358
  • adding myself as maintainer on the pinebook a64. by @Qvy-png in armbian/build#8513
  • config / BPi M2+: change order of preferred kernels. by @leggewie in armbian/build#8524
  • config / families: drop collabora kernel for RK3588 (#7381). by @leggewie in armbian/build#8532
  • config/desktop: update gnome-bluetooth pkg in noble and trixie (#8501). by @leggewie in armbian/build#8502
  • config: allow setting log level from yaml config. by @efectn in armbian/armbian-router#28
  • Drop CONFIG_CAN_TI_HECC module as it fails to compile. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/build#8527
  • Drop CONFIG_CAN_TI_HECC module as it fails to compile. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/build#8534
  • fix BPI-R4/filogic SFP support. by @tabrisnet in armbian/build#8517
  • Fixing breakage of sunxi64 edge. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/build#8516
  • Follow up to #8484 : Enable lte_em05 as a module. by @rafayahmed317 in armbian/build#8508
  • Home Assistant: Expand requirement to whole Debian. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/configng#660
  • Implement innosilicon phy usb3 driver for rk3328. by @paolosabatino in armbian/build#8510
  • motd: fix another alignment issue. by @leggewie in armbian/build#8533
  • nanopi-m6: add YX35 lcd support to edge kernel. by @efectn in armbian/build#8512
  • Override LOCALIPADD with localhost in documentation generation. by @Copilot in armbian/configng#657
  • pad double digits in odroidxu4-6.6 patch with a leading zero (#8520). by @leggewie in armbian/build#8522
  • patch: drop rk3399-fix-pci-lanes.patch from 6.16 kernel. by @leggewie in armbian/build#8526
  • Release logs for 25.8.1. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/documentation#799
  • Restore question about userspace upgrades. by @EvilOlaf in armbian/documentation#794
  • some small changes to APA extension. by @leggewie in armbian/build#8509
  • switch `kde-neon` to stable, switch support to csc. by @EvilOlaf in armbian/build#8519
  • Unit tests: PreClean Docker containers and images. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/configng#650
  • Update odroidxu4-current to 6.6.102. by @leggewie in armbian/build#8523
  • Update radxa-cubie-a5e.csc. by @juanesf in armbian/build#8505
  • Update TI k3.conf to use new official GitHub mirrors. by @Grippy98 in armbian/build#8530
  • Use systemd function and not wrapped on. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/configng#659
  • Workaround for building Helios64 . by @EvilOlaf in armbian/build#8496
  • Workaround for gigabit ethernet on some rockchip SoCs on edge kernel. by @paolosabatino in armbian/build#8515
